3. Check the "attendance" column for the corresponding row: The attendance for that row is found in the "attendance" column of row 12, which is 30936.
4. Compare the attendances for each week: To determine if week 13 had the most crowd attend, we need to compare the attendance for week 13 with all other weeks. In this table, we see that there are 16 rows (weeks). We will then loop through each row and compare the attendance of row 12 (week 13) with every other attendance value in the table.
